short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the live price of Ethereum on Coingecko

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep track of the current Ethereum price with our simple and convenient live ticker Chrome extension. Quickly check the price of ETH and view historical data directly from your browser. Stay informed in the ever-changing world of cryptocurrency with our extension. Install now for easy access to Ethereum price information.
